overview: Dunlop Sessions features blues guitarist and singer Ana Popovic performing with her band and discussing her love of the guitar, breaking into the scene as a woman, and the joy of playing live.  TRACK LISTING:  00:00 Interview - "I Always Wanted to Play Guitar"  01:16 "She Was A Doorman"  06:14 Interview - "You've always got to push yourself"  07:57 "Ana's Shuffle"  12:22 Interview - "Playing live is the best feeling in the world"  12:49 "Love You Tonight"  BAND MEMBERS:  Ana Popovic: Guitar & Vocals  Lavondo Thomas: Bass  Stephane Avellaneda: Drums  Adam Ahuja: Keys  Vincent Lars: Sax  Jeff Lewis: Trumpet
title: Anna Popovic: Dunlop Sessions
